00013 class MOC_Api_Loader_Registry {
00019     protected static $map = array();
00020 
00027     public static function register($function, $class = null) {
00028         if (is_array($function)) {
00029             foreach ($function as $k => $v) {
00030                 self::register($k, $v);
00031             }
00032             return;
00033         }
00034 
00035         if (array_key_exists($function, self::$map)) {
00036             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception(sprintf('Function "%s" has already been registered', $prefix));
00037         }
00038 
00039         if (empty($class)) {
00040             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception('Missing class name in register');
00041         }
00042 
00043         self::$map[$function] = $class;
00044     }
00045 
00051     public static function unregister($function) {
00052         if (!array_key_exists($function, $class)) {
00053             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception(sprintf('Unable to unregister function "%s". It has not been registred', $function));
00054         }
00055         unset(self::$map[$function]);
00056     }
00057 
00064     public static function getClassInstance($function) {
00065         if (empty(self::$map)) {
00066             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception('No function has been registered in the map');
00067         }
00068 
00069         if (empty($function) || !is_string($function)) {
00070             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception('Missing or invalid function name. Must be a string');
00071         }
00072 
00073         if (!array_key_exists($function, self::$map)) {
00074             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception(sprintf('There is no mapping for function "%s"', $function));
00075         }
00076 
00077         $className = self::$map[$function];
00078         if (!class_exists($className)) {
00079             throw new MOC_Api_Loader_Exception(sprintf('Mapped class "%s" from function "%s" does not exists', $className, $function));
00080         }
00081 
00082         $Object = new $className();
00083         return $Object;
00084     }
00085 }
